data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cho, Hee-Wook, Borowiec, Lech (2013): A new species of the genus Ambrostoma Motschulsky (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Chrysomelinae) from South Korea, with larval descriptions and biological notes. ZooKeys 321: 1-13, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.321.4972, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.321.4972
